column5: LOOKING FOR A GOOD BAIT SHOP IN RED LAKE OR EAR FALLS. TO PICK UP FISHING LIC. AND SOME MINNOWS AND LEACHES. A PHONE# WOULD BE GREAT. THANKS MARK
Lac seul Evergreen Lodge in Ear Falls, sells bait 807 222 3586, just one mile off hwy 105 down the road from 4 seasons.

If you are in Red Lake, stop at Bernie's Mini-mart across from the ballpark. As you come into town, the hospital will be on your left and you will come over a small hill. The mini-mart will be on your right. He has the licenses and bait that you're looking for. For some strange reason, we manage to stop at least once every summer to chew the fat with Bernie.

bernie's gas bar is now owned by his brother terry. very nice people. they have all you need for fishing. northern sporting supplies down town on main street, left at the lights have good selection also. those are the two main bait shops in the area.
